1.content:
Let's get started then.

What is the giant's house like?

(Note: type may also effect the characters' object interaction and also the character of the giant himself)

- Cave: the giant would be barbarian or primitive. A cyclops might fit as well.

- Roman Villa: the giant would be or dress like a Roman.

- Castle: This is variable and the giant could be of any type.

- Modern: The giant dresses and/or lives like a modern person.

Plus if none fit these categories, make one of your own as another choice.
1.title: Getting Started

11.content:
You have chosen the cave as the giant's residence.

What is the giant then?
11.title: Whose Cave?

111.content: How big is this giant caveman?
111.title: How Big?

choices: A HUGE hand grabs you from behind
A giant foot crashes down on you (not lethal yet)
You see a gargantuan humanoid approach
1111.content:
You boldly pushed on through the thick vegetation of the unexplored land. Your traveling companions had fled a few days ago, fearing the dangers of this area, but you weren't going to let such fears stop you. With a reasonable amount of supplies and food, you pressed on.

The plants seemed to be getting larger the past day. It was actually pretty exciting to see, perhaps these are new species. You'd probably get the right to name them when you got back to civilization. However, your thoughts were interrupted by a massive thud.
You quickly sought out shelter to hide as you looked for the source.
1111.title: 200 feet tall

choices: A flat rock between his legs as he is sitting down
11111.content:
You see a pile of rocks you can hide behind. As you run you try and see what made that big thud sound. Your getting closer to the rocks, a shadow blocks the sun, and before you can see what it is, suddenly your in a tight and dark space. You try pushing at the walls. They are pliable and soft, but has a bad smell to it. What ever it is has lifted you from the ground, as you feel weightless.

Next what ever your trapped in opens up and you fall a few feet onto a similar surface. Catching your breath you roll onto your back and look upwards. Your field of vision is filled with the gigantic face of a man. He brings you closer to his face and has a curious look. Looking around you see your in his hand. It covered in dirt and grim from not being clean. The nails have black gunk under them and that also seems to be the source of the bad smell. Looking at his features, and matted dark dirty hair, you conclude that he's a caveman.

His eye get closer to look at you. It's a brown color mixed with green. Next his other hand picks you up between two fingers and puts you under his nose. He takes a huge hurricane of a whiff, almost pulling you inside. Looking up, you can see the hairs and the boogers inside the nose, and your glad your not pulled in. The fingers lower you again, but only a bit till your in front of his lips. You try and get free not liking what you think is going to happen next. The lips open wide, revealing the inside of his mouth. His bad breath hits you like a punch to the gut. Saliva strands dripping from the roof of the mouth and into pools of spit at the bottom. Yellowed and broken teeth fill the mouth. The tongue rises up, and before you can brace yourself, slams into your body. He licks you slowly, covering you in spit, as he presses you into the tongues bumpy surface.

Pulling you away from his face, he smiles at you in his grasp. He closes you in his fist again, and walks off with you. The hand sways back and forth as he walks. You can't see were your going, but you don't like not knowing what he has in mind for you. Suddenly the fist opens and you fall onto a hard surface. Looking around you see your on....
11111.title: A HUGE hand grabs you from behind

choices: Pets you on the head and points to the food. He’s keeping you as a pet
Gesturing that you should eat. Your his guest
Licking his lips and drops more food. He liked your taste and thinks your food
111112.content:
He has dropped you in a bowl like stone. He seem to be gathering somethings, but every once in a while, he grins at you, and goes back to getting things together. You try to get out but it’s too high and steep to climb. All you can do is sit down and wait to see what he is going to do to you.

After about an hour the cave man returns and grins at you. The bowl you are in shakes violently as he drops some stuff next to it on the table. You are thrown off balance and land on your back at the center of the bowl. The smell of slightly cooked meat hits you as he drops a few pieces next to you in the bowl along with so type of leaves. Looking up at him he is....
111112.title: A stone bowl

choices: You try to get the caveman's attention
The caveman immediately sees you and picks you up
11112.content:
Desperate for shelter, you scurry towards a nearby cave. You're relieved that you finally found shelter to rest and dry off. As well as the overbearing vegetation, the intense rainfall soaked your entire body. You take a seat on the damp cavern floor and take off your jacket. The thorns on one of the many bushes you encounter shredded the cloth. What a shame, considering how expensive it was.

As you toss aside your jacket, you suddenly get the feeling that you're not alone in this cave. Call it adventurer's intuition.

Your suspicions are confirmed when a enormous slap of flesh pushes you down on the hard floor of the cave, pinning you from the waist down. You immediately try to wriggle out from the sudden obstruction amidst the stench, and succeed! You focus your gaze towards whatever pinned you down and find your mouth agape with shock.

A giant caveman sitting don a rock, with his left foot right in front of you and the other resting on his left leg. The giant prehistoric human had tan skin, long unkempt hair, and terrible hygiene. That combined with the fact that he was completely naked led you to take a step away from the man. He was well-built, with an almost flat stomach and large pecs. He was well-endowed as well.

While trying to think of what to do, you couldn't help but look at his cock as it sat, flacid, in between his legs.
11112.title: Caveman

choices: Places you on his rock to observe
puts you on his shoulder and shows you to his friends
111122.content:
As you decided what to do next, you noticed something about the caveman. The giant was very shaggy, chest and legs covered in hair. Oddly, the dirty caveman's face held no beard, though it wasn't exactly clean shaven either. Must have been burnt off while handling fire, you thought to yourself.

You were just about to laugh at your own quip when the giant caveman shifted on his rock, lifting one leg off the ground and leaning to the side. Before you could even ask yourself what he was doing, the man let out a blasting fart, so loud that the walls of the cave seemed to vibrate. But even worse than the sound was the smell. To avoid the bitter stench, you cover your face with your shirt. But it's not enough to stop you from coughing profusely.
You were so engrossed in your coughing fit, that you didn't even realize that the caveman heard you and was reaching down to grab you at this very second.
With great speed, the goliath snatched you off the ground and, just as quickly, brought you to his face.

The caveman is pinching you in between two fingers and watching you closely. He unconsciously breathes his rancid breath on you before sniffing your entire body heavily.

The giant caveman then...
111122.title: Getting a closer look

1111222.content:
You gave up on trying to break free from his grasp after a minute or so. The titanic being overpowered you by an infinite margi with the slightest of effort. All you could do was wait for him to finish toying with you and hope he'd lose interest and let you go. Occasionally his filthy hands would squeeze you forcing the air out of your lungs. Finally the poking and squeezing stopped. The titan grunted something, but you had no idea what. His language barely seemed to form words at all to you. The giant only frowned at your confused look and repeated himself louder.
"I... I can't understand you." You nervously reply despite knowing he wouldn't understand you either. And yet your strang manner of speech seemed to get the point across that there was a language barrier as his eyes peeked up. Suddenly he gently pointed at you and tugged at your shirt before letting go. You stared up in confusion while he looked at you expectantly. After a minute he tugged again and you realized what he was saying. "You want me to... to strip?" You asked again briefly forgetting the language barrier. He frowned again and simply ripped your shirt off before pointing to your pants. You were quick to comply this time, as you soon stood stark naked in his palm. The giant nodded and then placed you....
1111222.title: decides to "play" with you

choices: Its,more of a crib (he babies you)
It's just a fancy cave (he treats you like a pet)
11112221.content: The cave was blue and had a soft floor , but seemed to try and but your size at ten feet by ten feet. You sit down against the bars in a shock in this....thing
11112221.title: In a cage

choices: Frozen in terror (hope that Trex trick works on Giants)
Face the Giant head on (maybe he's friendly?)
112.content:
Your name is Chris , short for Christopher, and you are at a video game convention. This is the world's latest gaming Tech, the Cutting Edge, fresh from the labs, somewhat experimental hardware and software. Is convention is held once a year in different parts of the world, it's like the comic-Con and Olympics of video gamers, in this year you were lucky enough held in the US just one state over from you. It may have cost arm and two legs to buy a ticket, but it was so worth it.
You're a pretty awesome gamer, even won some awards in the more minor tournaments, but physically you were rather average. Brown fluffy hair that came down past your ears and stuck up in odd directions, green hazel eyes, pale-ish skin from too much indoor gaming, average height of 5 ft 10 in, and you're not fat by any means , you have only the minimal amount of muscle mass. Overall you looked like a very average, slightly scrawny, 17 year old.
Are you walk through the convention, occasionally stopping to check out new consoles or games, you Came Upon This more secluded area. You didn't know why so few people were around, the exhibit looked awesome. Some men in suits stood in front of a big black, silver, and white sphere. One man who was shorter and more friendly then the others spotted your interest and came over.
"greetings." he had a foreign accent that you couldn't place, it seemed Asian like his facial features, but you weren't sure. Years of online gaming with an international crowd had given you a knack for spotting country of Origins, but this guy had you stumped. " would you like to test our latest virtual reality chamber?" he asked, already putting his hand your shoulder and encouraging you towards it.
Not seeing the harm and having of Interest in this Tech, you allow yourself to be led over. The man goes over his company and they're driven interest in developing vR technology, but you strangely find it hard to listen, your gaze continuously being drawn to the sphere.
"so, would you like to test our companies top game inside?" the man asks, drawing your attention back to him. He holds out a game case, on it is a picture of a small warrior facing away towards a massive shadowy giant that takes up most of the cover. The title is in Chinese, you're not fluent but you get the gist, 'giant Slayer.'
Thinking this was an amazing opportunity, you happily agreed. The other, somewhat intimidating, men show you inside the sphere, the other man continuing a commentary on what's what inside. You're given couple bracelets that act as sensors as well as basic controls, and then put on a helmet with a visor. As the men leave, they tell you to hold perfectly still where are they left you so the computer could do a full body scan, then they closed the door and left you in temporary Darkness.
Light fills your visor, a message saying don't move and giving a countdown from 10. Once it reached zero, the game begins
" greetings, warrior, you have been deemed Worthy and given the mission of slaying the barbaric Giant that has been plaguing these lands. You have made the journey to the Giant Slayer and found the Beast is not home. You lie in wait for your opponent to return. Can you defeat him? Or will you die painfully or cowardly has so many have before you. Beware, the Giant has never failed defeat his opponent. Will you be the first? Good luck brave Warrior, I wish you well."
And with the introduction complete, the screen flashes a multitude of colors. You feel the room around you shift and cool air blast you all around. Was a final jolt of electricity that leaves you a little concerned about the tech, everything clears up and you can see the world around you.
The realistic detail of this VR is amazing. You find yourself in an immense cave, the ceiling soaring so high above you it almost makes you dizzy. The rest of the room is equally ginormous. To your right are some Boulders piled on top of one another with a long, flat stone your cul-de-sac (houses included) sitting on top as a sort of crude table of sorts. Next to it armoire piled rocks, except these are together by a bunch of trees bound around them buy thick rope, on top is a mound of what look like animal skins and leafy brush, a seat cushion. Atop the table is an assortment of clay bowls and cups, some massive candles, and what look like bags of herbs and probably dried meat.
To the left there is what looks to be a nest-like bed. A combination of animal furs, tree branches, and some sort of fluff all tied together circular wooden frame piled high with softest things the giant could probably find. It actually looked like it could be comfortable, if it weren't for how grungy it all looked; he wonder if the giant ever bothered to wash his sheets, or furs or whatever.
Behind you was a huge fireplace. A stone hole had been broken into the wall and floor, deep enough that there was little worry of a stray amber popping out and lighting something up. You were surprised at the heat radiating off it, you could actually feel it. Inching forward a little, you could see some still lit coals smoldering away and keeping the slightly stuffy cave pleasantly warm.
And then in front of where you first appeared, a towering doorway stood partially open. A massive Boulder, clearly meant to block it entirely, leaning a little to the side; if you wanted to run, there was certainly enough space to slip through. Next to the door sat some crudely woven baskets and what look like giant weapons or tools: A knife, ax, and astonishingly long spear...
That got you thinking about what you might have on you. You were supposed to slay a giant after all, had to have a weapon of some sort, right? Looking down at yourself, you saw that your clothes have been altered. Your gray hoodie was now made of sturdy but flexible leather, as wear your pants. A much harder leather was used to make shoulder pads that were sewn in to your hoodie, as well as made arm and leg guards. Surprisingly, you still look to be wearing sneakers, they just lacked any sort of branding and we're now a very dark brown. All your clothes were now different shades of brown, mostly in the darker Spectrum.
Looking over your shoulder, you finally found what you were looking for. Strap across your back, a long broadsword sat ready to be drawn by your left, dominant, hand. A backpack rested over the sheath, the straps tight around your shoulders to help keep everything steady.
Reaching back, you draw your weapon, surprised at its weight. He figured the game designers were doing for realism, but you would have guessed that this would be an exception to that, snoopy easier for the player to be able to wield their sword; especially since the game dropped you right in the middle of the Giant lair from the start.
Still, though it's a bit difficult, you are able to hold the sword with one hand. Looking down at it, you are amazed at how real the sword looks, this VR system truly is a Wonder of Technology. The metal gleams in the dim light of the cave, the edges looked so sharp. Acting on a whim, you reach down with your other hand and run your finger along the edge I keep seeing characters in a few movies do.
You quickly pull back with a cry of shocked pain, almost dropping the sword. Holding your finger up, you see a drop of blood welling up and slipping out of the fresh cut. It hurts, you think in shock, that actually hurts! That shouldn't be possible, even if this is a super realistic VR and all, it shouldn't cause this much pain. If it's still feel a slight sting has the cut met fresh air.
You start getting worried, this was very new technology after all, maybe there were still some bugs. Yeah, that's it, bugs. Before you came in here, the man said to pause the game and access the menu, all you had to do was tap the top wrist.
Putting your sword away, carefully, you bring up your hands and tap your left wrist. Nothing happened. You tapped it again, still nothing happened. Starting to panic a little, you tapped your other wrist, nothing. You start tapping and rubbing both wrists frantically, soon you begin moving hope your arms and giving yourself a full-body pat-down. Nothing! You can't even feel the big clunky helmet you had been wearing.
It says you are starting to really freak out, you heard a distant boom, quickly followed by a light vibration in the floor. Then another boom comes, and another vibration, this time louder and stronger. The Rhythm continues, with the boom / vibration happening closer together as they both grew more distinct. Your mind randomly thinks about lightning and thunder, first you see the lightning Flash and then hear the thunder because light is faster than sound. Another boom and rattling vibration, they are practically one in the same now. They say that if you count how long it takes between the lightning and thunder, it can tell you how close the storm is. Boom/Shake. Boom/Shake. They're happening at the same time now.
Of course, given Where You Are and why you were sent here, not to mention that one famous dinosaur movie, it's easy for you to link the booms to the sound of massive footsteps. Looking around, it's hard to tell exactly what the size difference is with all the crudely made furniture, but you guess from the doorway that you're about 2-4 inches tall compared to the Giant; no way you can fight him.
Looking around, you don't see many options for hiding, the bed / nest has no underneath space, the table has some rather uninviting knives on it - and all you can think about is that old giant story about using bones to make bread - and the fireplace still had some burning coals. There is a house sized pile of furs by the fireplace that could be a seat, a blanket, or a pile of dirty clothes from the smell of it.
The booming is right outside by the sound of it, you have minutes to decide what to do. If this isn't a VR, if this is really real, then your life may depend on your next choice. What do you do!?!.
112.title: Giant slayer, the videogame...or not!

1121.content: Every Instinct you had was screaming at you to run and hide, and that's exactly what you intended to do. This giant was reportedly destroying towns and killing people, especially those who challenged him. If he came in and saw you hear in his home, kill you for sure. Going over your options again, you decide to...
1121.title: HIDE YOU IDIOT!

11213.content:
With the fur pile being the closest thing, you run over and burrow in, doing your best to ignore the stale sweaty stink. The furs were heavy and were hard to move around under, there was even a degree of dampness that seems to have seeped in overtime and never really dried, allowing mold to settle in. In your adrenaline fueled state, you were able to ignore all the grossNess, to an extent.
Peeking out from under one of the shaggier pelts, you watched as the giant stepped into view. He was huge! Not just tall, and he was TALL, but also Broad and muscular. His body was ripped in well-defined, with only a slight gut keeping him from beating Schwarzenegger out for best bod.
He was also covered in hair. A thick beard that look like it was cut with a knife maybe twice a year. The hair top his head had a Shaggy Spike to it until it started to go behind his head, where it became long, grungy dreadlocks tied back with a strip of leather. The here sides of his head were done up in a few french braids that fell past his shoulders, little bone in wooden beads woven in here and there. The rest of his body had an abundance a body hair, some places it was just a light layer similar to peach fuzz, others it was a thick forest.
Tribal tattoos traced down both his upper arms, as well as all across his back in curling around his sides in a little up his chest. Then there were the scars. it looks like he's seen more than a few battles, with people your size, animals, huge monsters, and maybe even other Giants.
As for clothing, it mostly consisted of leather straps and belts. He wore no shirt, but he had some kind of fur and leather shoulder armor: The right having a black spotted red fur overlay, and the left add small metal studs in the leather pad. All of it was held to his body by a multitude of leather straps that leapt across his chest and back.
He also most definitely did not wear pants. Thankfully it was more than just a simple cloth wrap, though that did seem to be the basis of it. A thick belt wrapped around his waist held more fur pelts, and a wide hard leather guard around one thigh. His forearms had more leather straps, most likely to protect from attack. His leather sandals had chords that kept the bottoms lashed to his feet, as well as wrapped all the way up his calfs, holding another leather guard in place on the front of both his lower legs.
Assorted bits of leather, wood, metal, and Bone jewelry, in several crude weapons - one of which was a huge dual headed ax - all completed the absolutely wild and barbaric look of this beastly Giant. Staring up at him, even from a distance, from the now diminutive pile of muskie furs was truly intimidating.
Giant easily pushed open the skyscraper sized boulder that partially blocked his doorway and stomped in. In one hand he casually carried an ax the of a high school football field, in the other he held what look to be several dead deer Stags, dangling some of them by their antlers between his fingers.
Setting the ax side, it went straight into the kitchen, making you glad you didn't go in there. Just as the giant settled his kills onto the stone table, he paused and started to sniff at the air. His bright golden eyes seem to Glow as he baird his sharp fangs in annoyance, pointed ears flicking this way in that.
11213.title: The Giant

112132.content:
The Giant continue to sniff, drawing air in through both his mouth and nose, tasting the air. Chills ran up and down your spine at the rumbling growl that reverberated through the Giants deep chest. Closer and closer he came, his massive steps shaking the ground more and more
The Towering form of the giant was cast in Shadow above you by the setting sunlight from the doorway, still sniffing. You were about level with the giants knees which were only one (giant) foot away. From this angle, you were almost certain that you were about 2 in tall compared to the Giant. You were a bug, maybe a mouse, compared to this Colossus.
Your vision was suddenly filled with the Giants face, or more accurately his nose, knelt down and took a big whiff of the fur pile. Luckily you froze up at the terrifying sight, fearful that you'd been discovered, so the Giants sharp eyes couldn't catch your tiny hidden form. Even luckier, the smelly furs seem you have covered your scent, which apparently the giant could track - great...- and he failed to discern your sent from his own within the pile.
You managed to stop yourself from giving a sigh of relief, worried it might give you away after such a close call, has the giant stood back up. You waited with bated breath for the giant to go back to the kitchen and give you some space to think, but he didn't. Instead of walking away, he came closer, walking Around the Fur pile and standing with his back to it while he faced the dying fire place.
Deciding to risk it, you shuffle a little further out of The Furs and rolled to your back to look up at what the giant was doing. You were just in time to see the all encompassing shadow of the Giants rear end coming down on top of you. The last thing you saw before everything went dark was two overlapping pelts of his... Kilt? Separating and the rolled edge of his undergarment - like loincloth heading right for you.
Expected to be dead at that point, having a 33 foot tall giant man sit on you would normally lead to that, right? But you weren't dead, the unbearable Force crushing you between the mildewy furs in the Giants bare flesh certainly indicated that you weren't dead yet, you shouldn't be in this much pain if you're dead.
It seems The Furs were just soft enough that the full weight of this massive being wasn't enough to squash you flat, just smother you in grimey, sweaty flesh. Your body tried to squirm reflexively when it realized it couldn't replenish its oxygen supply, but you were fully pinned in place, the fur and flesh molding to your body shape.
When the giant mercifully lean Forward, it allowed a bit of fresh air into your still wedged space. In an act of desperation you began scrambling for a way out of there, fingers clawing at the grit filled fur as you slowly crawled towards the sliver of light seeping in from where the Giants bum lifted off The Furs a little.
The tight space still held you down, but you could move. Just as it had felt like you were getting out, everything starts to tighten again. It's like a living nightmare, like time suddenly slows down so that each individual second is drawn out in agonizing suspense.
You're so close, so very close. Your hand reaches out into the light and then...
112132.title: Suspense

choices: The giant gets up to return to his business
The giant relaxes too much and gasses you
1121321.content:
The Giant sit back down and you are once again trapped in darkness and pressure. This time it seems the rolled-up edge of the Giants undergarment has rolled up along his inner buttcheek even more, and it is putting even more focused pressure onto your puny body. Not to mention it seems the stench has gotten worse now, you hadn't paid much attention to it before when you were distracted by the weight and general lack of breathing, now it's VERY noticeable.
The Giant shifts in his seat, grumbling as he grinds you deeper into his fatty cheek on top in the grungy Furs on bottom. Suddenly the giant leans forward again, your hopes sore Until you realize that you've become stuck to his horrid skin thanks to all the sweat and grime. You watch as his massive hand comes down underneath him, you stop breathing for a moment thinking that he's found you - you have mixed feelings about that Prospect right now. But instead of going for you, the hand grabs the rolled Edge of his undergarment, gathering you up along with it.
As his massive fingers, all of them bigger than you, crash into your tiny body, they force the air out of your lungs. As his tree sized fingers kneed and twist the dirt encrusted cloth back into position, you wind up trapped inside the foul smelling fabric. With everything closed off now, the stench and body heat are drastically increased. Sweat quickly starts to pour down your face, soaking your clothes, it took you a minute to realize that it wasn't just your sweat but the Giants to. And that stench, eggy and foul, like the dump sight for all the porta potties after a rock concert.
Once the giant had finished adjusting his loincloth, he sat back down again to relax in front of his now much more active fire. You are crushed all over again between the butt and The Furs, only this time you were inside the disgusting fabric that is used to cover the massive man's crotch area and posterior, something you don't think has been washed since the Giant first started using it long ago.
Again the Giant started shifting around in his seat to get comfortable, crushing and grinding you under him. Your only salvation came from the fact that there was just enough layers of fat on his muscular glutes do not just squish you immediately. During the few minutes the giant was shifting , you suffered throughout your entire body, feeling it was on the cusp of being crushed out of existence. The stench of the definitely unwashed giant invaded your nostrils, making you choke when you had enough air in your lungs to do so, which in turn, allowed grimy sweat and blubbery flesh to force their way into your mouth; the taste so putrid that you would retch if you had the time to really think of it.
When the giant finally settled and relaxed into his chair, instead of experiencing the same all-consuming Crush from before, you instead found yourself wedged into a space between his bulbous butt cheeks. The stench and grime were worse, but at least you weren't being smashed to death. Then the Giant settled further into his seat and you realize just how dangerous your new position was.
As the cheeks on either side of you relaxed in the weight of the giant pressed more on top of you, he found yourself slipping in between the two glutes. You tried struggling - you finally had room for that now - you tried grabbing hold that filthy fabric that covered the Giants nether regions, but it was no use, your struggles only seem to make you slip between the sweaty cheeks faster.
You finally stopped at the point where the cheeks were pressed most closely together, thankfully before you went deep enough for you to see something you never wanted to see for as long as you lived. Because of all the pressure keeping you in place, you were once again immobilized, only slight air flow from up above allowed you to keep breathing, though the air was tainted. All you could do at this point is wait, the ball was in the unaware giant's court now.
1121321.title: No escape

choices: The giant sits down and eats
11213211.content:
A few minutes of the giant sitting and enjoying the warmth of his fire, all the while keeping you smashed between his ample cheeks, the giant must have remembered the dead animals he'd left on the stone table top. You feel the weight of the Giant shift forward as the fat covered muscles surrounding you tightened and flexed. Your stomach was left behind as the world around you rocketed upwards.
Each step the giant took ground you between his cheeks, muscles bigger than your bedroom working back and forth. You quickly realized that the butt cheeks weren't just grinding your body into a fine paste, they were eating you too! Each step shook and rocked your world, jiggling you loose and dragging you deeper in. The stench in heat were becoming truly unbearable, sweat and slime helping to lubricate your Passage.
By the time the Giant came to a stop at his table and started skinning and cleaning out his meat, you found yourself at Ground Zero for all stench. You cough and hack, inadvertently swallowing some of the gritty, foul slime that seemed to coat this entire space making you gag , your body doing everything it could to expel the invading toxins.
The giant continue to shift his weight from one foot to the other as he worked, unknowingly torturing you between his putrid buns. As one glute shifted upwards, the other would go down, dragging you across his oily slick, wrinkly hole. Thankfully you had enough presents of mind to keep your eyes shut, but the stench still made them water and sting.
Just as you were thinking that things couldn't get any worse, you've heard a deep rumbling come from Beyond the wrinkled wall you were plastered to. You hoped and prayed to whoever might be listening that the giant was just hungry or growling again, anything but what you feared most.
11213211.title: Even worse

choices: Giant goes outside to go to the bathroom
Giant's going to cook his food on the fier
112132111.content:
The rumbling grew louder, as the wall before you grew out words and began to twitch and tremble. You shook in fear, knowing what was coming. a slight hissing sound came from right in front of your face, the stench worsening, making you turn away as a bit of gas escaped under the building pressure.
With a grunt, the Giant pushed and the horrid hole opened. A blast of boiling hot methane gas hit you head-on, sucking all the meaning oxygen from your lungs and replacing it with raw stench. You were thrown back into the cheeks, with a deafening Roar of rancid air.
You finally come to a stop when you hit the loincloth thong. The worn, gritty fabric caught you like a safety net at the trapeze, leaving you to roll down to the lowest part of the crotch. You retched from the stench that still permeated the air, your mess not making much of a difference in the already filthy fabric.
All you can do at this point was just lay there in exhaustion and shock, your shaggy hair matted in plaster to your head or sticking up at odd angles. Somehow you've managed to hold on to your sheathed sword and backpack, though you're not sure of the state lee Supply is inside might be in.
He just sit there in near complete darkness, some light managing to leak through the Worn material underneath you, and feel the giants that was currently your world. Every shift in weight or shuffling of feet, all of it was felt right here at the Giants core. You also took note of a change in the smell, after your nose stop being scorched from the earlier gassing, it had taken a more musky scent.

You grab a string hanging down from the couch and start to climb, eventually reaching the top. The cushion is soft, and you fall and tumble down into the seat. When you turn around, there are two enormous pale soles, side by side, right in front of you. You look past the feet to see Erica looking down at you with a sly smile on her face. She doesn't say anything. You slowly back away and she playfully moves her feet closer. Her smooth, warm sole brushes up against you and you move back faster, your heart beating like a kettle drum. Soon, she has corned at the end of the couch with her feet. She presses you up against the armrest of the couch, burying your face in the arch of her incredibly soft, warm, and smooth foot. You cannot move. You detect a faint smell that you wouldn't admit, but you kind of like it.

After everyone leaves the room, she removes her foot. "I was watching you climb the couch. You're kind of cute. You like my feet?" she asks jokingly as she playfully taps you with the ball of her foot, knocking you over. She giggles, "You're a funny little man. I think I'll keep you. You can come to school with me today." She grabs a large, black leather boot and drops you into the sole. You look up, seeing her foot entering the round hole at the top of the boot. There isn't much time. What do you do?
14312221.title: Try to climb the couch and get her attention.

143122212.content:
All you could manage to do was stare up at the 13 year old girl's giant foot entering the boot. Before you knew it, the foot was on top of you. You had to lay down to avoid being crushed. She pushes her foot in, knocking the air out of you, then twists her foot to make sure it is on tight. Now you are pinned between the leather sole of the boot and the girl's soft pink sole. There is no room to move and you can barely breath. You feel yourself being lifted up in the dark. You descend quickly. "BOOM!" The giant boot crashes to the ground. The air is knocked out of you again as you are smushed between the boot and the foot, your face being forced into the soft, fleshy skin in front of you. Then again, and again. Erica is walking to school, nearly crushing you with each step. Her foot starts to sweat slightly. Soon, all you can smell is her foot. You try not to think about it, but deep down you know it is arousing you. You picture the smug smile on the girl's pretty face as she walks, degrading you beneath her foot. It angers you that she is treating you like this, but it strangely arouses you that you are no more than a toy to a 13 year old girl. You also have the suspicion that she knows you like it.

Soon, she is in class and you get to rest and catch your breath. Still, every once in a while she taps her foot or stamps her boot or scrunches up her sole, toying with you. Soon the bell rings and the ordeal starts again. This time she goes to gym class. You feel her foot pulling away, and see through the entrance of the boot the light of day, and feel fresh air. It is such a relief after the damp, stuffiness of the boot. Then you see Erica's face peering in. You struggle to hold onto something as the boot is turned upside down, but there is nothing to hold onto and you tumble down into her soft hand. One of her friends is also there, staring down at you. It is a hot, slender girl with dyed red hair.

"Wow! You really have a tiny man. And you keep him in your boot? Gross! What should we do with him?"

"Come on, ladies!" Yells the gym teacher. Erica quick shoves you back in her boot and puts it in her locker. "We'll figure it out later." They go off to gym class.
143122212.title: Try to lay under her arch.

14312222.content:
You stay under the couch, afraid of being stepped on. Soon the kids all go to school and the dad leaves for work. The doorbell rings and Cheryl goes to answer it. It is her older sister, Kathy, who often came over to visit during the day. Kathy was taller than Cheryl, heavy set, and looked to be in about her late 40's, early 50's. She had curly, brown hair and was wearing a blouse and shorts.

"Hi Kathy, come in." Kathy removed her sandals at the door. They came over and sat on the couch. The ground trembled violently with every step Kathy took. The women continued to talk as they sat on the couch. Kathy's feet were right in front of you. They were huge! They were very wide and you could see a lot of callouses when she raised her foot. You were mesmerized by this middle-aged woman's gigantic feet. You started to walk closer, your heart beating faster. You could smell the woman's feet from a short distance off. All of a sudden, "Flap!" The tv guide dropped right next to her feet. "I'll get it," you hear her say. She might see you. What do you do?
14312222.title: Wait under the couch, hoping everyone will leav...

choices: Wait for her to throw you in the garbage can.
143122221.content: You panic and hide in the tv guide just before the giant kathy picks it up. "Oh, this is last weeks. I'll go throw it out." She starts carrying it to the garbage can in the kitchen. What do you do.
143122221.title: Hide in the tv guide.

1431222211.content: You are not lucky enough to land on the carpet this time. You land on the linoleum floor in the kitchen with a crash. It feels like your leg is broken. You can't move. Kathy, of course, is too huge to hear you. You see her right foot land to your left, shaking the ground like an earthquake. It was immense, at least 20 times your length, and very wide. Then she raised her left foot to take another step. To your horror, it was right above you, descending upon you. There is nothing you could do. You stare up at the sole and watch it blot out the light. It fills your whole field of vision. You can see every callouse, wrinkle, and piece of dirt. The foot comes down, squishing you like a bug against the floor, the massive weight of the foot reducing you to nothing. You are now no more than a tiny stain on the bottom of Kathy's immense, rough, dirty foot.
1431222211.title: Jump out.

1431222212.content:
She throws you in the garbage can and the tv guide unfolds. The can is so full that you roll off the edge onto Kathy's foot. You quickly scramble off, but it is too late. She has already seen you. You run as fast as you can across the floor,with Kathy's enormous footfalls rumbling the ground behind you, the sound of each step almost deafening and the shaking almost knocking you over.

"Oooh! A bug. I love to feel them sqqquuiiish under my bare feet." You hear Kathy say over the sound of her footsteps.

You reach a wall. There is nowhere to go. You look up to see Kathy's huge foot raised above you. She slowly steps down, the huge sole of her foot blotting out your vision. When it gets close enough you can smell the strong smell, and then you can feel the warm surface. She sqishes you with the ball of her foot and twists you into the floor.

"That felt good." she says as she walks back to the living room with what's left of you stuck to the bottom of her foot.
1431222212.title: Wait for her to throw you in the garbage can.

143122222.content: She bends down and picks up the tv guide before you can do anything. She glances under the couch and see's you. "Cheryl, there's a bug under your couch. Don't worry, I'll squash him good." She uses the tv guide to move you out from under the couch and onto the living room floor. She stands up and raises her giant foot above you. She is about to stomp you when Cheryl yells, "not on the carpet, it might leave a stain!" She lowers he foot and instead of stomping you, picks you up with her toes.They were huge toes anyway, but to you, one toe was probably as thick as you were. You sqirm around and try to get free, but she scrunches her toes. The strength of her toes is like a vice. You think for sure your bones will be broken. She raises her foot up and drops you in her hand and looks down at you. What do you do?
143122222.title: Stay where you are.

choices: There is a girl sunbathing in a bikini on the neighbors lawn. Go there.
1431222221.content:
"Looks like I squished it in my toes." said Kathy, almost proud of herself.

"Eww." Says Cheryl, "Go throw it outside."

Kathy opened the door and threw you out onto the lawn. It is not safe to be out in the open like this. Where should you go?
1431222221.title: Play dead

choices: Say hello and introduce yourself to them.
14312222212.content:
You decide to try looking in the neighbors house, thinking there might be a phone that you could use to call for help. You easily slip under the door at your size and walk into the carpeted living room at the bottom of the stairs. Before you think of where to go, you hear a rumbling up stairs. You look up to see two gigantic boys, both about ten years old, chasing each other down the stairs. The first was the neighbors son, a tall blonde haired boy with blue eyes. Behind him was one of his friends, an Asian boy from next door. From the look of it, they had had a sleepover the night before. The blonde haired boy, Mikey, was wearing shorts and a long t-shirt and the other boy, Andy, was wearing a pair of pajamas, and they were both barefoot. There were running so fast that before you could react, they were down the stairs. As they ran over you, Mikey's bare foot slammed on top of you and you were wedged between his warm, sweaty toes. As he continued to run, you were helplessly slammed up and down with the boy's foot. They ran through the kitchen and back into the living room until Andy tackled Mikey onto the floor and you fell out from in between his toes. You were completely out of breath and overheated from all the action, but you had no time to react as the boys started wrestling on the ground. As they rolled around in a heap on the floor, you were swept up in the giant heated mass of bodies. You were being tossed around too much to realize where you were. For about five minutes, you were being kicked, grabbed, punched, sat on, rolled over, and stepped on by the giant wresting boys until they decided to go back upstairs. As they stood up, you were too exhausted to do anything as you watched Andy's foot descend upon you and found yourself once again wedged in a boy's stinky, sweaty toes. You were slammed into the carpet with every step as they ran upstairs and woke up their other friend, Timmy, a brown haired boy who was a little younger than them. As they sat on the ground deciding what to do next, Andy was wiggling his soft, smelly toes, rolling you around in the soft warm skin until you eventually broke free and started walking across the carpet. Then one of the boys spotted you,

"Hey is that a bug?"

"It looks like a little person."

"Cool! Let's try to catch him."

What do you do?
14312222212.title: Giant boys in the neighbor's house.

143122222121.content:
Because they recognized you as a person and not a bug, you knew they would not kill you and thought your chances were better with them than somewhere else. You stood in the middle of the room and waited until Mikey came over a wrapped his huge, warm fingers around you and held you up to his enormous face, which completely filled you vision, breathing heavily on you.

"Cool!" They all exclaimed, staring at you, "It's a little man."

"Hello!" You shout to them.

"Wow, he can talk. Let's play with him."

They got out their action figures and played with you, grabbing at you and throwing you around. You kept trying to ask them for help, but they could not here you because they were making too much noise. Then Mikey had an idea,

"I know. Let's pretend like we're giants and he's snuck into our house and we have to try to kill him or squish him or eat him."

"Yeah, that sounds like fun!" Said the other two. "Let's be careful, though, we don't want to kill him or we won't be able to play with him anymore."

"Yeah, you can't actually squish him, just pretend to squish him. Alright, let's start." They turned around and starting counting. You ran, but were still out in the open when they finished counting. Their eyes scanned the ground, looking for you.

"Fe Fi Fo Fum," said Andy, jokin around and they all laughed and stomped around like they were giants. Then Andy's eyes zeroed in on you. He started stomping towards you. You ran, but were cut off by the instep of his foot slamming down in front of you. You ran into the boy's soft, brown skin and were overwhelmed by the smell of his foot. He bent down and picked you up in his hand and held you above his mouth.

"Hmm, little humans taste good," he said as he rubbed his belly.

"Noo," you shout as he slowly opens his mouth. "This game has gone far enough."

"He drops you in and you are drenched in saliva. He swishes you around with his tongue as he closes his mouth and you are left in complete wet darkness.

"That was awesome," They all say as he takes you out of his mouth.

"He moves around a lot in your mouth."

"My turn!" yells the youngest, Timmy. Andy dries you off with his shirt and puts you on the ground. Timmy walks up to you and raises his foot above you. "I'm going to squash you under my giant foot for sneaking into my house!" He slowly lowers his foot. You cannot do anything but lay down on the ground and the boy sets his giant foot on top of you. He was very careful not to squash you and set his foot down very gently, pinning you under the ball of his pink sole. His foot was even softer than the other boys' and did not smell as bad. He twisted his foot on top of you, pretending like he was grinding you into the ground. You have to admit that being under his foot was not that bad and you actually kind of liked it. You started to smell the sole in your face and then gave it a little lick. Timmy giggled and removed his foot. "HeHe. He tickles under your foot."

"I want to try!" Said Mikey and he quickly set his soft, pale foot on top of you a lot less gently than Timmy. You were pinned right under the arch of his foot and he began to twist it back and forth like Timmy. You actually began to appreciate his foot a lot more and began licking his big sole. He giggled but did not remove his foot. He bent his toes back, stretching out the skin of his sole and began rubbing his giant, sweaty sole back and forth on you. "Wow, it feels so cool." You were starting to like this boy's foot more and more and were licking his soft, warm, sweaty sole as much as you could. He sat down and picked you up in his hand and starting rubbing your face on his foot and scrunching his smelly toes around your head. Andy also sat down and they played with you with their feet, pinning you between there soles and wrestling you with their toes. "This is cool!" They both agreed.

Then it was time for them to go home. "Who's going to keep him?" They argued for a while, then they said, "I know, let's let him decide."

The all sat on the floor and put their feet out. Who's feet should you go to?
143122222121.title: The giant boys' giant game.

choices: I want to sleep in your shoe
I want to sleep curled up between your toes
1431222221211.content:
You had been with Mikey's feet first, so you walk over to him. He smiles down at you.
"Alright, he chose me. Don't worry guys, you will get a chance with him too."
Mikey takes some time to rub you along his sole and in between his toes. It was now time for him to go home. He says his good-byes and puts you in his shoe for the walk home. He slides his foot in and positions you under his toes, so that you aren't killed by accident. He walks to his house and goes up to his room. He removes his foot from the shoe and picks you out. He then proceeds to start rubbing you all over his feet. He places you on the ground and gently rolls you underfoot, coating you in his foot sweat. And you're loving every minute of it. He then slides you in between his toes and you get covered in his toe jam. You taste some of it and it tastes horrible, yet oddly good as well. He continues playing with you in this fashion for several hours. Finally it is bed time.
He turns to you and asks, "Where would you like to sleep little one?"
You think for a minute and reply...
1431222221211.title: Stay with Mikey.

1431222222.content:
You jump up and down frantically on the palm of her hand. "Stop trying to crush me! I'm not a bug, I'm a human!" You're not sure if she can hear you, but she definitely can tell you're a little man and not a bug. She gets a devious look on her face.

"He's dead," she says to Cheryl, "I'll go throw him out."

She takes you into the kitchen and hides you in her pocket. All you can see is black. Shortly after you hear her say, "Well, I really need to get going. I have errands to run." In about ten minutes she arrives a her house. She pulls you out of her pocket. You sit still in her huge palm as she gazes down at you in wonder.

"This is so exciting. I always wanted to play with a tiny man. I think I know what we'll do first. We'll play a little game of hide and seek. I'll set you free on the ground, count to ten, then try to find you. When I find you, I have to step on you. If you can avoid being stepped on until I get bored, then I will not squash you, until later, of course. He he he."

With that she put you on the linoleum flor, turned around and began to count.
1431222222.title: Try to get her attention

14312222221.content:
You don't have much time so you hide in the nearest hiding place, behind the leg of the table. She finishes counting and turns around and takes one step. The ground shaking beneath her giant foot makes your heart pound as you think of what it would be like to be crushed flat beneath it.

"Here I come little man. Can't wait to feel you squish beneath my bare foot."

The first thing she does is get on her knees and check under all the furniture in the kitchen. As she approaches the leg you are under, she is so close you can feel her warm breath, but you avoid getting caught by circling around the leg like a squirrel.

"He must not be in here." Her footsteps thunder as she leaves the room. You breath a sigh of relief and then go look for a better hiding spot. You are walking across the linoleum floor when, "BOOM!" A giant foot slams in front of you. You look up in horror to see Kathy towering above you.

"Ha. I just waited outside the kitchen. I knew you would show youurself eventually. Its gonna feel so good to squish your puny body beneath my foot. Crunch real good for me now." She raised her horrible, wide foot above you and paused, staring down at you ffrom above her foot. You tremble in fear looking up at her huge, tree trunk like leg. You cannot stop staring at the callouses on the bottom of her giant foot. The smile on her face, a look of true delight, makes you feel puny and exposed. You see her leg muscle twitch and "SLAM!" She stomps her foot down at an amazing speed. You are instantly crushed flat. She twists her foot back and forth, reveling in the feeling of you sqishing underneath it.
14312222221.title: Hide somewhere in the kitchen.

choices: The coast is clear. You explore the house.
One of the giants heads towards you...
1432.content:
You wake up and find yourself in a very different environment. The wooden floor is much bigger than anything you've ever seen before. Behind you towers an impressive door.

Could you escape?

You run for the door. The knob is too high for you to reach. You look beneath the door at the crack between it and the floor. It is too small for you to squeeze through.

The only way is forwards.

You walk further into the hallway, only to stop at an impressive sight. Before you stands a row of enormous sandals and sneakers. You try to ignore the reek of foot odor as you size yourself up against them.

They are more than huge...they are gigantic! Compared to a normal-sized man, you are no more than 1/2 an inch tall in comparison to the owners of these colossal footwear.

Suddenly you hear thunderous footsteps drawing closer. A giant is coming!

You hide behind one of the sandals, hoping to escape the giant's gaze...
1432.title: Share House Giants

14321.content:
The footsteps head towards you. Suddenly two of the enormous sandals in the row get pulled up and placed in the doorway. The giant slips both of his feet tightly, then fumbles with his toes to experience the feel of the leather.

"I'm going to swim practice, guys!" he shouts in a deafening thunderous voice. "See ya later!"

No responce echoes through the house. Nevertheless, the giant quickly parts the door and slams it. The gust of wind knocks you off your feet.

As you right yourself, you soon contemplate finding a way out of this house.

You leave the safety of the wall of sandals and head for...
14321.title: A Relief...

choices: You attempt to wake him up
Another giant jock enters and sits on the couch
143211.content:
You wander into the livingroom, picking your legs up over the long noose-like fabric of the carpeting. On one end stands a television so large that anyone within a mile could watch it. Adjacent to that stands a firm couch with a coffee table in front.

But what greatly distracts you is the sound: a loud nasal snore amplified almost a thousand times. As you approach the couch, you see two enormous feet dangling over the arm.

As you wander beneath the coffee table, you can see a sleeping giant. In boxers, the giant hunk rests with his head in the crotch of the cushion and the other arm. His mouth opens and closes like a living cave, his uvula dancing with each rumbling breath. Each time he snores, you shut your nose tight.

"God, his breath reeks!" you think to yourself. "Like old potato chips and beer, gross!"

Unaffected by the opinion on his breath, the giant continues to snore.

Eventually...
143211.title: Giant Couch Nap

choices: He taunts and plays with you for a while
The eager girlfriend makes a suprise visit
1432111.content:
For a few moments you scan the massive figure on the couch with your eyes, caught completely in awe at the sight of him. His muscular frame would have been intimidating enough without being a mere insect in comparison to him. As dangerous as it would be you decide that perhaps getting his attention would be best for you as if worst came to worst, you would rather be a pet than vermin.

Lining the corner of the couch are tassels that spread right up to the arm of the couch. As this seems to be the only way to reach him, you walk over and begin your ascent. Every couple of minutes the sleeping giant would toss and turn, making you worry that he might wake up and leave, putting all your efforts in vain. After a long and tiring hour you finally reach your destination.

In front of you an enormous face breathes an odorous gust towards you. Holding your breath you approach it with you feet heavy in the couch. You begin to press in to the thick skin on his cheek which seems to cause no reaction. Next you begin punching in to it, causing a twitch. Being half an inch seems to do little more then create the sensation of having a bug on the skin, barely enough to wake somebody.

A dangerous thought comes in to your mind as you look at his eyelid. Prepared to take a risk you push your arm in between his eyelids and in to his eye. Quickly you duck as a colossal finger replaces you and starts rubbing the eyelid. A loud rumbling groan and his opening eyes indicate the giant had woken from it's slumber. You begin to jump up and down excitedly to gain his attention. He squints in confusion. Suddenly you are snatched by two massive fingers and suspended in front of his face as he takes a seated position. The quick move upwards leaves you disorientated for a moment. You realize after you regain your senses that his expression has changed from confusion to an unsettling grin.
1432111.title: A Good Idea?

14321111.content: What does he taunt and play with you with?
14321111.title: He taunts and plays with you for a while

143212.content:
As you enter the kitchen, the bright lights and the clattering of air vents make you shutter. But those mean nothing to the lingering aromas. Enormous pizza boxes pile on top of an unfathomably high counter. You can see a pickup-truck sized piece of hard candy beneath the counter. Besides that there is the fresh smell of ham and mayonnase.

As you look up, you can see why.

Before you stands a heavyset muscled jock with long shorts and firm legs. His long blonde hair runs down his shoulders. With blue eyes and no shirt or shoes, he looks like a god straight out of mythology.

After he stabs some ham onto large slices of bread, the size of a house or two, he slathers the meat and forest-sized lettuce with an filmy ocean of mayonnase. He caps a second giant slice above his creation.

He shouts into the other room "Max, do we still have some beer?"

"Yeah," responds an indistinguishable voice from outside the room.

The giant places his ham sandwich on the kitchen table and walks towards the refirgerator for a beer.

You...
143212.title: Kitchen Adonis

1432121.content:
You follow the giant to the refridgerator several steps behind him, careful not to be underneath his colossal heels. When he opens the refridgerator, an arctic blast of air chills you to the bone.

"Where did you put it?" the giant roars over the hum of the refridgerator.

"Bottom shelf," shouted the indistinguishable voice once more. "In front."

As the giant adonis leans towards the bottom shelf for a can of chilled beer, he...
1432121.title: Follow him to the refrigerator

14321211.content:
The giant reaches for the base of the fridge for a fresh beer. In fear of being caught, you panic and search for somewhere to hide.

In this panic, you brush against his big toe.

The giant leaves his concentration and immediately looks down towards you. Then with his cold hands, he reaches down and picks you up.

As you approach his billboard-sized face, you realize...
14321211.title: He sees you

choices: He shares you with his friends
143212111.content:
The giant smiles a gentle smile.

"Cool," he coos under his breath. "Are you some kind of bug or something?"

"I'm no bug," you respond. "I'm a human."

Though unsure how to react, the giant scratches his chin as if to comepletely understand what you said.

"My name is Brad," he smiles. "Nice to meet you, tiny human."

With that, he grabs your hand between his thumb and index fingers and shakes it gently.

"Don't be scared..." he responds.

With that...
143212111.title: Meet Brad

1432121111.content:
Brad looks back as his roomies watching TV in the other room.

"I guess I have to hide you, tiny human," Brad whispers to you.

"Why?" you ask him. "Will they eat me if they find me, or something like that,"

Brad's smile turns cynical "No, they'd hardly notice a fly. But I don't enjoy the thought of you in their hands..."

With that, Brad's fingers curl around you and surround you. The whole world gets dark, except for light breaking through the gaps between the giant's fingers. After a while, your prison releases and you find yourself on a unstable fabric terrain.

You're on the giant's bed.

Brad looks down from above you. "Now you stay there, tiny human. I'll be right back."

After that, he leaves the room.

Now you are all alone, and you decide to...
1432121111.title: Brad's secret

choices: Brad, with his beer and ham sandwich
14321211112.content:
Suddenly, loud footsteps thunder from behind the door.

You look for a flimsy cavern of the giant's bedsheets, but you are too scared to move.

The door creaks open to reveal...
14321211112.title: Someone's coming...

143212111121.content:
It's Brad. Holding a beer in one hand and his ham sandwich in another, he kicks open the door and quickly shuts it.

"Hey, tiny guy, you in here?"

You emerge from your hiding place as Brad sits down on his bed. He sets his beer on the nightstand and the sandwich on the bed. He picks you up and puts you between his well-formed pecs. The soft surface beneath you twiches as you can feel his heart beat. Beyond, you can hear his stomach churning as he digests the last few bites of ham sandwich.

Brad picks off a crumb from his meal and puts it towards you.

"Hungry?" he asks.

The crumb, at your size, is big enough for a small meal. But in politeness, you pick it off and eat it. Brad smiles. He hands you a shred of lettuce and a crumb of cheese and ham. Finally, you pass down the offers. You are too full for any more.

"Had enough?" he asks. "Here, how bout something to wash it down."

He dips his finger in his beer can and holds it above you.

"Open wide," he says.

The drop descends on you. Though much of it goes in your mouth, some of it douses your clothes.

"Oops," says Brad. "Didn't think that was too big for you."

After a few more colossal bites of his sandwich, Brad looks down on you and says...
143212111121.title: Brad's back!

choices: I want to stay with Brad! (Brad keeps you)
I want to stay with Mike! (Mike takes you)
143212111122.content:
Someone else walks into the room and you panic but that gets his attention. As soo as he sees you he walks to you and bicks you up with his hands. "What do we have here, I don't think I have ever seen something like this before. He smirks and places you in his pocket and tries to walk out but just in time Brad walks in. "What did you just put in your pocket?" Brad asks in a menacing tone. You can hear from your dark prison and you yell thinking that Brad may actually be able to help you.

He eventually heard you and grabs into your kidnappers pocket. You see fingers pick you up and once you see light you see two guys. Brad and someone who is apparently called Mike. "What? I was just having some fun"

"Mike please just leave and please don't tell the others" Brad says while he places you on the bed. You hear them argue for a bit until they turn around and ask you a question.

"Hey, tiny human!"

"Should Mike stay or leave?"

"Or should I place you under Mikes care?"
143212111122.title: Someone else...

choices: Stay hidden, and scope out the apartment
Before you can decide, Jesse's friend arrives
1441.content:
When you regain consciousness, you open your eyes t ofind a close, dark roof over your head. You get up and crawl to the edge of the enclosure, and look out upon a broad living room. It's not the expensive furniture or emmaculately clean nature of the room that shocks you, but the fact that compareed to you, it's humungous. Not only the room, but each piece of furniture is gigantic comapred to you. That's when you realise that you're crouching underneath an armchair - One that looks to be the size of a small skyscraper.

You hear footsteps thudding behind you, and all thoughts of how the hell you got here are diminished for a moment. You watch the checkerboard Vans walk around the armchair and stop right in front. The heels face you as the seat creaks over your head and you hear a young voice, talking on the phone. "Hey man, it's Jesse. I was wondering if you wanted to come over to my new place and hang for a while."

You recognise the voice as Jesse McCartney, one of your biggest idols. But now he really is your biggest idol, and you're going to have to decide whether to reveal yourself to the giant teen or try to find a way out of this strange mess on your own..
1441.title: Jesse McCartney

choices: Go exploring anywhere you like in the house
Exercise your huge foot fetish with your hero, Jesse McCartney
